remarks: Two expressions for a 1-dimensional subspace of partial vector space A (when ` F ` is a nonzero vector i.e. non-identity translation). (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dia1dim2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia1dim2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia1dim2.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dva1dim2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia1dim2.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dva1dim2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dia1dim2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( I ` ( R ` F ) ) = ( N ` { F } ) ) $.
